branchCategory.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/4 ~ 1 inch
branchCategory.description: <p>The VXZ series is a 2 port, pilot operated solenoid valve capable of operating at higher differential pressure by maintaining a zero pressure differential pressure on the valve seat. It is compatible with wide range of fluid. Flow rate ranges from Cv of 1.7 to 10.2.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/4 ~ 1 inch
